channel.title: Zenith scape help please?
channel.description: I have downloaded zenith scape and have been editing some thing inside of it and the yell tags i really hated how they were 3 different colors and im sure i fixed it but i still need to know how to make staff =p there is no ::givemod or anything like that i know its like how i made my self owner but im not sure where to search can someone please tell me wat to search its a 718 btw its different then going into the player files.

item.title: Zenith scape help please?
item.dc:creator: @Bank_Coding Bank Coding
item.description:
@Bank_Coding wrote:

If you know how, you could make a command that changes rights.

I don’t know if it will work but try this:

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("givemod") && (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAMEHERE") || player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("WhoEverElseYouToHaveTheCommand"))) { String username = cmd[1].substring(cmd[1].indexOf(" ") + 1); Player other = World.getPlayerByDisplayName(username); try { if (other == null) return true; for (Player players : World.getPlayers()) { if (players == null) continue; players.getPackets().sendGameMessage(other.getDisplayName() + " just got promoted to Mod!"); } other.setRights(Settings.IS_MOD); //World.removePlayer(other); } catch (Exception e){ player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("Couldn't find player "+ username + "."); } return true;

If that doesn’t work try this to change rights in game:

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("setrights") && player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("Bank")) { String username = cmd[1].substring(cmd[1].indexOf(" ") + 1); Player other = World.getPlayerByDisplayName(username); if (other == null) return true; other.setRights(Integer.parseInt(cmd[2])); return true;

Read full topic
